CIRCULAR  NO.   35 /  2002 
 
 
Sub : 
 
 
 
The officers of Indian Air Force, Navy and Army have to enter ATC 
building at IGI airport from landside to file Traffic Clearance with ATC.  They are 
facing some difficulties entering the ATC building for want of BCAS passes. 
 
 
In order to facilitate the Air Force / Navy and Army officials in their 
operational requirements, it is hereby directed that Air force / Navy and Army 
officials on presentation of their Armed Forces Identity cards accompanied by an 
Authorization letter mentioning full details of the officers seeking entry to the ATC 
building signed by their respective Commanding Officers of the Unit be allow to 
enter from the land side to ATC complex of IGI airport; Delhi to file Air Traffic 
Clearance with ATC.  All such access will be subject to security check.  Their 
entry will remain restricted to ATC complex only. 
 
 
 
(R.K. Singh) 
Addl   Commissioner  of  Security (CA) 
 
Ref. No. CAS-9 (37)/96-PIC     dated 07.11.2002
